Producer: Yue Cui, Zhuoqin Huang, Lu Tao, Mu Tao, Ying Wang
Screenwriter: Lingzhi Sheng, Wei Zhu, Ben He, Li Chen, Lejing Shen, Yifan Xu
Synopsis: Based on the classic wuxia novel Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils by Louis Cha (known worldwide by his pen name Jin Yong), SAKRA stars Donnie Yen as Qiao Feng, the respected leader of a roving band of martial artists. After he is wrongfully accused of murder and subsequently exiled, Qiao Feng goes on the run in search of answers about his own mysterious origin story--and the unknown enemies working to destroy him from the shadows.
Title: Sakra
